metadata.Description: Government agencies responsible for collecting and analyzing statistical data.

national statistical offices.Description: National statistical offices collect and address energy access data to inform policy decisions and improve energy access.
National statistical offices employ energy analysts to analyze energy data and provide insights for sustainable energy planning.
National statistical offices collaborate with research institutions to conduct studies on energy consumption and trends.
National statistical offices support energy efficiency programs by providing data and insights for program development and evaluation.
National statistical offices administer energy surveys to gather data on energy consumption and usage patterns.
National statistical offices measure renewable energy capacity to track progress towards sustainable energy goals.
National statistical offices align their energy data collection and reporting with the Sustainable Development Goals.
National statistical offices are government agencies responsible for collecting and analyzing energy data.
